crawl1.description: Felix has been crawling for 7 days.  Sometimes he does push-ups to prepare himself.
crawl1.title: Crawl 1

crawl2.description: Felix hasn't been giving crawling his full attention.  He still thinks walking is more important, and goes to standing whenever possible.  But he's still managed to pick up crawling speed and develop his own personal style:  he keeps the right knee tucked under his body, slides that leg along the ground, and steps with the left leg.  It lets him go from crawling to sitting quickly, which is important when you stop to smell the roses as often as Felix does.
crawl2.title: Crawl 2

crawl3.description: During his crawls, Felix unerringly finds the most un-baby-proof thing in the vicinity.
crawl3.title: Crawl 3

cyndi1.description: What do dot commers do when the internet bubble bursts?  Have babies!  These all popped out from ex-Phoenix Poppers.  From back to front:  Leila (with mom Aisha), Jasper, Avery, Felix.
cyndi1.title: Cyndi 1

cyndi2.description: Cyndi, one of the many fertile ex-Phoenix Pop staff members,  organized the baby party.  She's five months pregnant.  She's holding Miles, Albert Poon's son.
cyndi2.title: Cyndi 2

cyndi3.description: Felix taking a gander at Meeta feeding Avery.
cyndi3.title: Cyndi 3

cyndi4.description:
Hazel looks on at the roaming disaster that is Jasper (left) and Felix (right).

Jasper and Felix were born a day apart in the same hospital, and are looking more and more like twins.
cyndi4.title: Cyndi 4

escape_artist.description: Now that Felix is mobile, diaper changes have become a sporting event.
escape_artist.title: Escape Artist

nap1.description: Since Felix can roll over and move about, he sleeps however he chooses.  He chooses to sleep adorably.
nap1.title: Nap 1

smiles1.description: As long as the littlest Moses has a good night's sleep, he's a beacon of squirmy good cheer.
smiles1.title: Smiles 1

smiles2.description: Felix is really into Mom right now.
smiles2.title: Smiles 2

storytime.description: He's started to sometimes look at the book before chewing on it.
storytime.title: Storytime

toybox.description: The smile of a baby who has removed every single toy from the toybox.
toybox.title: Toybox

toybox2.description: He does this a lot at the moment.  We can't figure out if it's half standing or half crawling.
toybox2.title: Toybox 2

woodside_hike.description: Mike, Patricia, and the Moses family on a Sunday hike.
woodside_hike.title: Woodside Hike

description:
This week, Felix has picked up speed on his crawling, lived though some teething, outgrew a bunch of clothes, and turned 8 months old. He gets more and more happy and bubbly and smiley every week.

This week's videos. There's one of him crawling, one of him banging, and one of his naptime behavior.
title: August 11
